# Bioinformatics Tools for Breeding Applications

Open-source software designed to make genomic analysis more accessible for plant and animal breeding programs.

[Explore Tools](tools/index.qmd){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg} [View Tutorials](tutorials/index.qmd){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-lg}

:::

## About This Site

This site provides bioinformatics tools, tutorials, and workshop materials for genomic applications in breeding. The tools span variant calling, population genetics, genomic selection, and data visualization — built in **R**, **Python**, and **Rust**.

## Featured Tools

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
::: {.card-header}
**BIGapp** · R Shiny
:::
::: {.card-body}
User-friendly web app for genomic analysis—GWAS, genomic selection, PCA, and more—without command-line tools. Supports diploid and polyploid species.

```r
BIGapp::run_app()
```

[Documentation](tools/bigapp.qmd) · [GitHub](https://github.com/Breeding-Insight/BIGapp) · [Live Demo](https://big-demo.shinyapps.io/bigapp-main/)
:::
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
::: {.card-header}
**BIGr** · R Package (CRAN)
:::
::: {.card-body}
Core genomic analysis functions for diploid and polyploid breeding programs. The computational backbone for BIGapp.

```r
install.packages("BIGr")
```

[Documentation](tools/bigr.qmd) · [GitHub](https://github.com/Breeding-Insight/BIGr) · [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=BIGr)
:::
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
::: {.card-header}
**castgen** · R Package (CRAN)
:::
::: {.card-body}
Estimate sample sizes needed to capture genetic diversity in breeding or conservation populations.

```r
install.packages("castgen")
```

[Documentation](tools/castgen.qmd) · [GitHub](https://github.com/alex-sandercock/castgen) · [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=castgen)
:::
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card}
::: {.card-header}
**Binx** · Rust CLI
:::
::: {.card-body}
Fast command-line tool for polyploid and diploid genomic analysis, built in Rust for performance.

[Download from GitHub Releases](https://github.com/alex-sandercock/Binx/releases)

[Documentation](https://binx-docs.readthedocs.io) · [GitHub](https://github.com/alex-sandercock/Binx)
:::
:::
:::

:::
